author: Z.B. Steele
description:
Featuring top-notch animation, deeply woven themes and character building, a heart-stirring (and heart-breaking) romance, and some utterly, gloriously un-hinged action sequences, Mappa’s Chainsaw Man: Reze Arc is the best animated film I’ve seen since Studio Ghibli’s Spirited Away.  “Hey, Denji, which one would you choose? The town mouse? Or the country mouse?” For those who […]

The post REVIEW: Chainsaw Man: The Reze Arc appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Chainsaw Man: The Reze Arc
